statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ 3 \\ -15 \\ -7 \\ -15 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -13 \\ 9 \\ -24 \\ -7 \\ -17 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 11 \\ 3 \\ 15 \\ 13 \\ 25 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 23 \\ -21 \\ 45 \\ 9 \\ 25 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
